Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom offers our Business Advantage Pro (BAP) membership to provide you with access to licensed attorneys and tax professionals. This service provides unlimited half-hour consultations on new legal and/or tax matters with licensed attorneys and tax professionals to help you ensure you are making the best choice for your business from a legal and/or tax perspective. These consultations can be in regard to a wide variety of new matters, including tax issues, liability, employees and hiring, and intellectual property.
In addition, this membership provides unlimited access to our Legal Forms database, which includes over 100 commonly used legal business forms, as well as a free Copyright filing every month (excluding US Copyright Office filing fee).
